selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions
Class Random

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.model.distributions.Random

public class Random
extends java.lang.Object

This is a wrapper for the random number generators we will use to do our sampling. I only wanted to create one MersenneTwister engine because of its overhead, all sampling distributions will use this engine.

Author:
Charles Robertson
